name: blog
description: blog list application, that allows users to save information about interesting blog they have stumbled across on the internet

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf dist && cd ../../part2/phonebook && npm run build --prod && cp -r dist ../../part3/phonebook/
scripts.deploy:to-other-repo: cd ../../../production-fullstackopen && rm -rf * && cp -r ../fullstackopen/part3/phonebook/. . && git add . && git commit -m deploy && git push

author: HosenbundIO
